title: A Brilliant Ride
description: Penelope Dupres lives in an affluent suburb of New York City where the rich get richer and dirty little secrets can cost you your life. With two murders, a philandering husband and dark secrets nipping at her heels, she searches for true love and happiness. Enter Brilliant, a dreamy hero...with a halo! Join Penelope for the ride of her life as she kicks up her heels and creates her perfect dream come true.
author: Lisa J. Mitchell
